Class MyBot

java.lang.Object
  MyBot

public class MyBot
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main class containing the body of the game Bot. The name and form are as required by the specification of the competition. Contains standard input/output handling and simple self-made logging utility.

Constructor Detail

MyBot

public MyBot()
Method Detail

DoTurn

public static void DoTurn(PlanetWars pw)
This method is called each turn after the input information is parsed. All of the AI algorithms are contined in static helper classes and called from within this method. This method changes the game state object taken as argument and calling it mutliple times on the same game state object is not thread safe.

Parameters:
pw - object containing the parsed game state taken from stdin

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Infinite loop waiting for incoming game state. Creates a new game state object (PlanetWars) which parses the stdin.

log

public static void log(java.lang.String msg)
Simple self-made logging mechanism. Completely static, writing to mylog.txt file. Used only for troublesome debugging.

Parameters:
msg - the full text to be logged
